io.druid.indexing.overlord

Class TaskLockbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.druid.indexing.overlord.TaskLockbox

  • public class TaskLockbox
extends Object
    Remembers which tasks have locked which intervals. Tasks are permitted to lock an interval if no other task outside their group has locked an overlapping interval for the same datasource. When a task locks an interval, it is assigned a version string that it can use to publish segments.

    • Method Detail

      • syncFromStorage

        public void syncFromStorage()
        Wipe out our current in-memory state and resync it from our bundled TaskStorage.

      • lock

        public TaskLock lock(Task task,
            org.joda.time.Interval interval)
              throws InterruptedException
        Acquires a lock on behalf of a task. Blocks until the lock is acquired. Throws an exception if the lock cannot be acquired.
        Parameters:
        task - task to acquire lock for
        interval - interval to lock
        Returns:
        acquired TaskLock
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the lock cannot be acquired

      • tryLock

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<TaskLock> tryLock(Task task,
                                                org.joda.time.Interval interval)
        Attempt to lock a task, without removing it from the queue. Equivalent to the long form of tryLock with no preferred version.
        Parameters:
        task - task that wants a lock
        interval - interval to lock
        Returns:
        lock version if lock was acquired, absent otherwise

      • findLocksForTask

        public List<TaskLock> findLocksForTask(Task task)
        Return the currently-active locks for some task.
        Parameters:
        task - task for which to locate locks
        Returns:
        currently-active locks for the given task

      • unlock

        public void unlock(Task task,
          org.joda.time.Interval interval)
        Release lock held for a task on a particular interval. Does nothing if the task does not currently hold the mentioned lock.
        Parameters:
        task - task to unlock
        interval - interval to unlock

      • unlock

        public void unlock(Task task)
        Release all locks for a task. Does nothing if the task is not currently locked.
        Parameters:
        task - task to unlock
